w:r.w:t: The teacher will teach basic travel words by using TPR, sentence frames, and vocabulary. Students will study these words and phrases:

travel, car, airplane, boat, I will travel, I will need, I will pack, I pack my suitcase, I travel by car, I travel by airplane, I travel by boat, We drive on the road, We fly in the sky, We ride on the water, camera, toothbrush, passport, tickets, clothes, money, suitcase
